## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (c80d50a5d149e186763199f475ecd3c23a25e41c93cabeea13494c6bf8c1641a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@pagseguro/pagseguro-utils-test' @ 1.999.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
